Antetuli.text: Bring some fish with you to-day

Antevolo.text: Bring some fruit with you to-day

Anthedon.text: Bring some game with you to-day

Anthera.text: Bring with you when next you come

Anthrax.text: Business is suspended on account of holidays

Antidotum.text: Cannot be at business to-day; am suffering from an attack of ---

Antistes.text: Cannot be at business to-day; bring letters, &c., here

Antlia.text: Cannot be at business to-day; send anything requiring my attention here

Antrum.text: Cannot be at business to-day; send clerk with letters, telegrams, &c.

Anxietas.text: Cannot be at business to-day; send messen-ger with letters, &c.

Anxifer.text: Cannot be at business to-day; too unwell

Anxiferum.text: Cannot be at business to-day; unnecessary to send messenger, but post letters

Apage.text: Cannot be at business to-day until late

Apagesis.text: Cannot be at business for a few days

Apathes.text: Cannot be at business for a few days; letter by post

Aperio.text: Do you consider the business sound

Apexabo.text: Buy for me on best terms

Aplustre.text: Can buy more on same terms
